_sText:
Hi guys! Today is January 20, 2020 

I made this map for fun, as I always wanted to do something nonstandard and I did it.

Try to go through all 56 levels on the map, which are not so difficult, the basis of the map includes 53 levels, 2 levels in the bonus (which are at the end of the map) and 1 solo level (which is in the center of the map).

Also at the end of the map you can buy a teleportation cannon from the portal, which is attached to the scout, and it is located behind your back (everyone sees it, it will not prevent you from passing the map in any way)

The map was developed a long time ago, yesterday I decided to play it with the players and everyone was quite happy, I just fixed the triggers a bit and I think that there shouldnâ€™t be any problems, but if there are any problems with the map, then hurry up to inform me of them.

Compiled in HDR FULL COMPILE, also Added all the textures.

Sound Music Start, Russified voice acting at levels.

Thank you, good luck!
